item.title: Now
item.description:
About me

Currently Position: Global AI Strategy Lead at Hoffmann-La Roche

  • Worked across R&D, Manufacturing, Supply Chain, Commercialization and Partnering
  • Conceptualized and strategized execution of enterprise AI initiatives
  • Driven by making innovation useful and impactful

Interests

  • Writing research content
  • Learning new technologies
  • Exploring medical advancements
  • Shipping production-ready solutions

Tooling

  • Pen and Paper
  • Vim
  • GitOps
  • Kubernetes
  • Typescript
  • Rust
  • Python
  • TDD

Background

  • PhD in Life Science and technologies EPFL
  • Master’s in Computer Science
  • Bachelor’s in Computer Science

Continuous Education

  • INSEAD Business School
  • RAPS Regulatory Affairs Professional Society
  • ICH-GCP Good Clinical Practice
  • Certified Kubernetes CKA/CKAD/CKS
  • Linux Foundation Certified System Administrator (LFCS)
  • AWS Professional and specialty certifications

item.title: Past
item.description:
Past Projects

  • Laboratory Research Assistant Immunology (2006)
